Reviews.Title: Bad one
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: First, I ordered the one with power, video and audio.  But they sent me the one with no audio.  Second, after using more than a month, it's turned bad.  NOT RECOMMENDED !!!

Reviews.Title: For All True Americans!!!!
Reviews.Author: D6
Reviews.Content: So it takes one to let others know. If your looking for U.S MADE, This is NOT For you. This Item is made in china (PATHETIC).

ProductInfo.Features:
Length: 25ft
Siamese Cable
22awg twisted pair, standard
Video: 95% copper shielded coax
Connection: BNC video, 5.5mm power, RCA Audio
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo W-VPA2008 25ft Pre-Made Plug-n-Play Surveillance Video, Power and Audio Cable
